com.mycompany

Class TransactionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mycompany.TransactionManager

  • public class TransactionManager
extends Object
    This singleton class implements the quorum protocols for db operations, mantaining a unique sequence number
    Author:
    Orazio, Alessandro

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void awaitTerminationAfterShutDown(ExecutorService threadPool)
      This method is used to wait the collection of db responses from all threads
      String dropCollections(String path)
      Drops replicas' databases collections.

      HashMap<String,Object> parseJSON(String object)
      This function is used to parse a string containing a JSON object
      String quorumRead(String readPath)
      Strart a quorum read operation in the db
      String readQuorumDecision(ArrayList<String> resultList)
      Scans collected result to reach a read quorum
      String second2PCphase(int sequenceNumber, boolean commit)
      Second phase of the 2PC write, it can be a commit or an abort, one thread is created for each db replica to send a request
      ArrayList<String> sendThreads(TestResult result, String path, String requestType)
      Creates one thread for each db replica to send a request
      void setSequenceNumber()
      sends a GET request to all replicas to get the max sequence number in use in their log files and sets the sequence number property according to it
      String twoPhaseCommitWrite(TestResult result, String writePath)
      Strart a 2PC based write operation in the db
      String writeQuorumDecision(ArrayList<String> resultList)
      Collected results from first phase of 2PC are collected end a commit or an abort is started

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static TransactionManager getInstance()

      • setSequenceNumber

        public void setSequenceNumber()
        sends a GET request to all replicas to get the max sequence number in use in their log files and sets the sequence number property according to it

      • dropCollections

        public String dropCollections(String path)
        Drops replicas' databases collections. NB: for develop use only.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the drop replica manager REST
        Returns:
        string containing the outcome of the operation

      • twoPhaseCommitWrite

        public String twoPhaseCommitWrite(TestResult result,
                                  String writePath)
        Strart a 2PC based write operation in the db
        Parameters:
        result - the result data to be inserted in the new db entry
        writePath - the URI for the request to the db
        Returns:
        string containing the outcome of the operation

      • quorumRead

        public String quorumRead(String readPath)
        Strart a quorum read operation in the db
        Parameters:
        readPath - the URI to use for the request to the db
        Returns:
        The value read through the quorum protocol

      • sendThreads

        public ArrayList<String> sendThreads(TestResult result,
                                     String path,
                                     String requestType)
        Creates one thread for each db replica to send a request
        Parameters:
        result - the result data to be inserted in the db
        path - the URI for the request to the db
        Returns:
        List containing the results collected from all replicas

      • second2PCphase

        public String second2PCphase(int sequenceNumber,
                             boolean commit)
        Second phase of the 2PC write, it can be a commit or an abort, one thread is created for each db replica to send a request
        Parameters:
        sequenceNumber - sequence number of the write db operation
        commit - boolean, true for commit, false for abort
        Returns:
        String containing the outcome of the operation

      • writeQuorumDecision

        public String writeQuorumDecision(ArrayList<String> resultList)
        Collected results from first phase of 2PC are collected end a commit or an abort is started
        Parameters:
        resultList - the results collected in the first phase of 2PC write
        Returns:
        string containing the outcome of the operation and the outcome of the commit/abort operation

      • readQuorumDecision

        public String readQuorumDecision(ArrayList<String> resultList)
        Scans collected result to reach a read quorum
        Parameters:
        resultList - collected results from quorum read
        Returns:
        the string which have reached the quorum, else an error

      • awaitTerminationAfterShutDown

        public void awaitTerminationAfterShutDown(ExecutorService threadPool)
        This method is used to wait the collection of db responses from all threads
        Parameters:
        threadPool - the threadpool containing all the threads

      • parseJSON

        public HashMap<String,Object> parseJSON(String object)
        This function is used to parse a string containing a JSON object
        Parameters:
        object - Stringified JSON object
        Returns:
        HashMap containing the object (key-value), the value has to be casted to right type to be used
